Author: TonyL#3577
Content:
ok, on OSX to install adb:
1) Install Homebrew (in case if it's not installed yet): `ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)"`
2) Install android cli tools: `brew cask install android-platform-tools`
3) After it you should be able to use adb `adb devices`

Author: TonyL#3577
Content: Also you need to enable USB debugging on your phone (it vary of Android version)
